title: Login bug patch 7.6
body: Ever since this new patch I couldn't sign into my league account that I had for over 3 years that haves all my skins, ward skins, player icons, runes and masteries, etc. I tried logging on many times so I know that it isn't just me forgetting my password or anything, my password is very simple and short and i use it for almost every password i have and logging on never has been an issue. I don't know what to do, I try making a new account but it just doesn't feel the same :c idk what to do can somebody help me pls! btw my account that's not logging on anymore is named "luhximo". even the OP.GG reads it but when i try to sign in it says "this account password and username does not exist please try again".  I don't understand riot...{{item:3070}}

replies.body: I having the same problem i was just playing on it last night but this morning i couldnt login now im playing on my 2nd account but i still want my main account

If you know the password you're using is 100% the one you set up, there's a chance that your account might have been 'hacked' and the password was changed. We can help you get control of your account again if you reach out to us through our [**Account Recovery Form**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416)!

Remember to stay signed out when you send that ticket, and we'll have you back on the Rift in no time!
